item.title: Clearing GCP Professional Cloud Developer Certification
item.description: It has been few months that I have been working with GCP products and offerings. Recently, I recieved a company-sponsored opportunity to avail the GCP Professional Cloud Developer certification. Certfication I went for : https://cloud.google.com/learn/certification/cloud-developer Blog about the experience and preparation: https://medium.com/@SabujJanaCodes/clearing-gcp-professional-cloud-developer-certification-38c4de5e1865
